subject: feat(import): make id, version, timestamps optional in JSON import
body:
AI-generated JSON output no longer needs to invent IDs. Nodes only
require `title`, connections only require `sourceId` and `targetId`.
Missing `id` fields get auto-generated UUIDs. Missing `version`,
`created`, `modified`, and `contentType` get sensible defaults.

Connections can reference items by title in `sourceId`/`targetId`
(title-based fallback was added in previous commit), so the full
minimal AI output is just titles + labels + content + connections.

Guide updated: JSON structure, rules, template, and tips all
simplified to show the ID-free format as the default.

Tags: import, json, ai-output, simplification
Complexity: 2
Urgency: 3
Impact: user-facing
Risk: low
Debt: paid
Epic: ai-research-output
Semver: minor
